title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, Sri Shanmugha College’s first grand Onam, lit up with cultural programs, traditional attire, pookalam, Thiruvathira, music, games, and payasam—creating unforgettable festive memories.
name: Munna Shaheem P

title: Great Experience
text: Aarmaadham'24 was indeed a highlight of my Onam experiences so far! Shanmugha's enthusiasm and energy are infectious, and I'm looking forward to Asthra'25 being another memorable celebration!
name: Fathima Jinan

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, by the 2021–2024 batch, was Sri Shanmugha College’s first grand Onam, with pookalam, Thiruvathira, performances, games & payasam—uniting all in joyous celebration.
name: Fadal
